articles.title: Opinion: For Canada to navigate a new world order, B.C. must deliver results in 2026
articles.description: Bridgitte Anderson: Canada entered 2026 with something it hasn't had in years, consensus on economic growth. Consensus, however, isn't success. If 2025 was about agreement, 2026 must be about results.
